description: The ancient ruin lies shrouded in a perpetual twilight, as if the very sun itself had abandoned this forsaken place. The air is thick with the scent of damp earth and decay. Overgrown vines creep through broken windows and doorways, as if nature itself sought to reclaim this crumbling edifice.

rooms.description: The grand entrance hall, a once-majestic space now reclaimed by the encroaching jungle.
rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.passages: A large wooden door with intricate carvings leads to Room #2. A hidden passage behind the stone tapestry connects to Room #5.

items.name: The Last Chronicle of Eldrador
items.description: An ancient tome bound in worn leather, its pages yellowed by time.

rooms.description: A narrow corridor lined with dusty portraits and flickering torches.
rooms.name: Gallery Corridor
rooms.passages: A door made of solid oak leads to Room #1. A narrow staircase descends into darkness, potentially leading to Room #6.

items.name: The Portrait of a Forgotten Queen
items.description: A faded portrait of a once-beautiful queen, her eyes seeming to follow those who gaze upon it.

rooms.description: A large chamber filled with ancient artifacts and mysterious devices.
rooms.name: The Repository
rooms.passages: A door hidden behind a tapestry leads to Room #7. A series of cryptic symbols etched into the wall potentially reveal a secret passage to Room #8.

items.name: The Celestial Clockwork
items.description: An intricate device consisting of gears, cogs, and glittering gemstones that seem to move in harmony with the stars.

rooms.secrets: A hidden compartment within the Celestial Clockwork device contains a small note with cryptic instructions.

rooms.description: A musty room filled with old texts, scrolls, and forbidden knowledge.
rooms.name: The Library
rooms.passages: A door hidden behind a stack of dusty tomes leads to Room #5. A small window high above the floor potentially allows access to Room #9.

items.name: The Forbidden Tome of Xandros
items.description: An ancient text bound in human skin, its pages filled with forbidden knowledge and dark magic.

rooms.description: A hidden room deep within the ruin, concealing secrets and treasures.
rooms.name: The Hidden Sanctum
rooms.passages: Accessible through a secret passage behind the stone tapestry in Room #1. A small door leads to Room #4.

items.name: The Golden Chalice of Eldrador
items.description: A golden chalice adorned with ancient runes, said to grant its owner immense power and wisdom.

rooms.description: A labyrinthine staircase leading down into darkness.
rooms.name: The Descent
rooms.passages: The narrow staircase descends from the Gallery Corridor in Room #2. A series of cryptic symbols etched into the wall potentially reveal a secret passage to Room #8.

items.name: A Flickering Candle
items.description: A candle made of a strange, glowing material that casts eerie shadows on the walls.

rooms.description: A large chamber filled with ancient artifacts and mysterious devices.
rooms.name: The Repository
rooms.passages: Accessible through a door hidden behind a tapestry in Room #3. A series of cryptic symbols etched into the wall potentially reveal a secret passage to Room #8.

items.name: The Celestial Atlas
items.description: A celestial map depicting the movements of stars and planets across the sky.

rooms.description: A room filled with cryptic symbols and ancient runes.
rooms.name: The Cryptic Chamber
rooms.passages: Accessible through a series of cryptic symbols etched into the wall in Room #3. A door hidden behind a tapestry leads to Room #7.

items.name: The Runes of Xandros
items.description: A set of ancient runes that, when deciphered, reveal the location of a powerful artifact.

rooms.description: A small room with a single window high above the floor.
rooms.name: The Window Chamber
rooms.passages: Accessible through a small window high above the floor in Room #4. A door hidden behind a stack of dusty tomes leads to Room #5.

items.name: A Rare, Ancient Book
items.description: A book bound in fine leather, its pages filled with knowledge from a long-lost civilization.
